attributes.action: Legalise Euthanasia and allow sufferers such as the late Tony Nicklinson the right to release himself from unnecessary torment.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the British people have been heartbroken by the case of the late Tony Nicklinson who was left suffering with 'locked in syndrome' after a terrible stroke.

We ask that the law be changed and atleast considered as the ruling Tony faced during his own court case was incredibly one-sided. We wish to prevent the suffering of people currently struggling with conditions similar to Tony's.

Let those who wish to, die with dignity.
